name: Manda no Yume
description:
Manda no Yume is a Yume Nikki fangame made in 3½ weeks for Dream Diary Jam 2017. 

Manda enters a different world when she lies in bed. In this world she can discover effects that give her new abilities. She can combine these effects to create effect combinations, some giving her unique abilities.

Version 0.01c includes 5 main dream worlds, 12 effects, and 26 combinations. There is currently no ending or event upon obtaining all effects. A new update is currently in development, focusing on recreating maps and adding new content. Progress can be tracked here.
